switchEquip.name: Auto Equip
switchEquip.hint: Automatically equip/unequip items when switching sets

showWeaponsItems.name: Show Weapons in 'Use Item' Section
showWeaponsItems.hint: Show weapons in the 'Use Item' section. Usefull if your weapon slots are not enough

showClassActions.name: Show Class Actions
showClassActions.hint: Show class actions in the Main Action bars

condenseClassActions.name: Condense Class Actions
condenseClassActions.hint: If 'Show Class Actions' is enabled, condense class actions in pairs to save space

noAA.name: Don't Apply Active Effects
noAA.hint: Don't apply active effects when using special actions. (requires refresh)

showSpecialActions.name: Show Basic Actions
showSpecialActions.hint: Show basic actions in the Main Action section. (Dodge, Dash, Disengage, Hide, Ready, Shove)

macroPanel.name: Macro Panel
macroPanel.hint: Show a macro panel for each character that mirrors the hotbar macros

showTooltipCost.name: Show Tooltip Cost
showTooltipCost.hint: Display the action/item cost in tooltips.

showTooltipRecallCost.name: Show Tooltip Recall Cost
showTooltipRecallCost.hint: Display domain card recall cost or resource value as a separate tooltip line.

showTooltipRecovery.name: Show Tooltip Recovery
showTooltipRecovery.hint: Display recovery information (Long Rest / Short Rest / Scene) in tooltips.

showTooltipResources.name: Show Tooltip Resources
showTooltipResources.hint: Display related resources in the tooltip (item or action resources).

showLootItems.name: Show Loot in Inventory
showLootItems.hint: Show loot items in the Inventory category of the HUD. Useful if you want quick access to loot without opening the full inventory.

showDomainMetadata.name: Show Domain Metadata
showDomainMetadata.hint: Include domain and level information for domain cards in tooltips.

includeVaultDomainCards.name: Include Vault Domain Cards
includeVaultDomainCards.hint: Include domain cards marked as 'inVault' in the HUD loadout.

showPassiveActions.name: Show Passive Actions
showPassiveActions.hint: Toggle the display of passive actions in the HUD that do not have a clickable ability, but have tooltips.

debug.name: Debug
debug.hint: Enable debug logging for tooltip heuristics and matching.
